description.value: When you swear an oath of devotion, you begin a life in service to your chosen ideals or virtues. Many paladins who swear an oath of devotion choose to live their lives as virtuously as possible. Some paladins choose a specific virtue or code of honor, and they often hold themselves to almost impossibly high standards. Paladins who swear an oath of devotion are more resistant to mental influence than other paladins, and can stand as literal beacons of light against their foes.
